resource_boost_wood_25.name: Lumberjack's Blessing
resource_boost_wood_25.description: Increases wood production by 25% for 1 hour.

construction_speed_10.name: Architect's Draft
construction_speed_10.description: Reduces construction time by 10% for 1 hour.

research_speed_10.name: Scholar's Insight
research_speed_10.description: Reduces research time by 10% for 1 hour.

favor_production_10.name: Divine Offering
favor_production_10.description: Increases favor production by 10% for 1 hour.

troop_speed_10.name: Winds of Haste
troop_speed_10.description: Increases the speed of all troops by 10% for 1 hour.
